Helper functions¶

General functions

yapim.utils.helpers.prefix(_path: Union[str, pathlib.Path]) → str¶

Extract prefix from file path

Parameters

_path – Path-like string

Returns

For path /path/to/file.txt return file

yapim.utils.helpers.touch(_path: str)¶

Mimic linux “touch” command

Parameters

_path – Empty file path to create, or to check if it exists
